home.description: Embark on unforgettable journeys with Al3asal — where exceptional service meets exclusive travel experiences. Discover the world with comfort, care, and unmatched value.
home.topDestinationsSubtitle: Explore the most popular travel destinations among our users.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Your journey to excellence starts here
aboutUs.description: Your first destination for travel and tourism, where we offer a selection of the best destinations and exclusive deals for unforgettable experiences around the world.
aboutUs.subtitle2: Your journey to excellence starts here
aboutUs.description2: At our institution, we believe true quality starts with small details. We work passionately and professionally to provide you with exceptional services and experiences that exceed your expectations. Our goal is to be your first choice through our constant commitment to development and innovation.

feature1.title: Advanced Booking System
feature1.description: Ease of booking and quick service to ensure a smooth and distinctive experience.

feature2.title: Comprehensive Services
feature2.description: We provide complete solutions that meet all your needs with the highest standards of quality and attention.

benefits.easyBookingDescription: Book your trip in simple and quick steps with no hassle.
benefits.bestPriceDescription: See only sellers who support your preferred methods
benefits.support247Description: We're here to help you anytime, anywhere.
benefits.securePaymentDescription: No hidden fees, taxes or other nasty surprises

contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are always happy to hear from you. Our team is ready to answer all your inquiries and assist you in planning your next trip.
contact.callDescription: Call us to speak to a member of our team.
contact.helpDescription: For help with a current product or service or refer to FAQs and developer tools.
contact.otherHelpDescription: For help with additional products or services.
contact.followDescription: Stay connected through our social media channels.
contact.formDescription: Please fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

popularAirlines.title: Popular Airlines
popularAirlines.subtitle: Explore top-rated airlines trusted by travelers around the world.

footer.description: Al3asal Travel & Tourism offers unforgettable travel experiences with exceptional services and unmatched value. Discover the world with comfort, care, and unmatched value.

blogs.title: Articles
blogs.description: Stay updated with the latest articles and travel tips, and discover inspiring travel destinations and experiences around the world.

profile.noDataText: Once you book any trips, you'll see them here.

receipt.name: Name
receipt.dataProtectionNotice: Data Protection Notice: Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the applicable carrier's privacy policy and, where your booking is made via a reservation system provider ("GDS"), with its privacy policy. These are available at https://al3asal-travel-agency.vercel.app/privacy or from the carrier or GDS directly. You should read this documentation, which applies to your booking and specifies, for example, how your personal data is collected, stored, used, disclosed and transferred.
receipt.thankYou: Thank you for choosing Al3asal Travel!
receipt.contactForSupport: For any questions or support, please contact our customer service.
